name: .RBT File Extension
summary: Learn about .RBT files and view a list of programs that open them.

description: Program written for a LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT robot using the NXT-G programming system; includes functions that define the movements and actions of the robot, such as picking up an object.

content: NOTE: LEGO MINDSTORMS NXT "evolved" into LEGO MINDSTORMS EV3 in 2013.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download
